algorithms.RSSalg.resultStatistic

Class ClassifierEnsemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.RSSalg.resultStatistic.ClassifierEnsemble

  • public class ClassifierEnsemble
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that represents the statistics (instance ids, predictions and confidences for each prediction) about the instances labeled by the ensemble of classifiers. In this implementation a single classifier is treated as an ensemble of 1 classifiers.
    The class is JAXB annotated so that this statistics can easily be saved to an XML file.

        Adds a prediction for the instance

      • getConfidences

        public Confidences getConfidences(double instanceId)
        Returns classifier confidences for the instance (for each possible class, the confidence of each possible classifier from the ensemble that the instance belongs to that class). Returns null if the instance hasn't been classified by the ensemble (is not present in ensemble statistics)
        Parameters:
        instanceId - instance id
        Returns:
        classifiers confidences when classifying the instance with the given id or null if the instance hasn't been classified by this ensemble

      • getConfidence

        public java.lang.Double getConfidence(double instanceId,
                             java.lang.String label,
                             int classifierNo)
        Returns the confidence of one of the classifiers from the ensemble that the instance belongs to the given class
        Parameters:
        instanceId - instance id
        label - the name of the class to get the confidence for
        classifierNo - the index of the classifier from the ensemble (starting from 0)
        Returns:
        the confidence of the classifier from the ensemble that the instance belongs to this class

      • getCombinedConfidence

        public java.lang.Double getCombinedConfidence(double instanceId,
                                     java.lang.String label)
        Returns the co-training style ensemble confidence that the instance belongs to the specified class. Co-training style confidence for a class is calculated by multiplying the confidence of each of the classifiers from the ensemble that the instance belongs to the specified class. If there is only one classifier in the ensemble this method returns the confidence of the single classifier. Returns null if instance is not labeled by the ensemble
        Parameters:
        instanceId - the id of the instance
        label - the name of the class to get the confidence for
        Returns:
        ensemble confidence for the class (co-training style)

      • getPrediction

        public java.lang.String getPrediction(double instanceId)
        Returns the ensemble prediction for the instance. The ensemble prediction is based on co-training style ensemble confidence, see getCombinedConfidence(double, String). The prediction is determined as the class label with the highest ensemble confidence. If all classes are equally probable, ensemble will vote in the favor of the 1st class listed in the classNames parameter of the DatasetSettings. Returns null if the instance was not classified by the ensemble
        Parameters:
        instanceId - instance id
        Returns:
        ensemble prediction for the instance

      • getClassifierNo

        public int getClassifierNo()
        Returns the number of classifiers in the ensamble
        Returns:
        number of classifiers in the ensemble
